overview:
Toby Salgado is a serial entrepeneur and angel investor. Toby is a founder and father of 3.

Toby was coufounder of Workexchange which he helped raise 7MM dollars in venture capital and grew the company to 38 people.

Toby founded BNT Erosion Control and grew it to 55 employees and 5MM in revenue

Toby cofounded COF Capital a private equity firm focusing on Gap financing. He helped raise a 12MM dollar round and did 78MM in transactions in the first year.

His latest project is www.taskhero.com an online marketplace where users outsource their daily tasks and errands to US military veterans and enlisted service members.
